subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Four men reached the Round of 16, but Patrick McEnroe, head of the United States Tennis Association’s player development program, said U.S. tennis had “a long way to go.”
snippet: Four men reached the Round of 16, but Patrick McEnroe, head of the United States Tennis Association’s player development program, said U.S. tennis had “a long way to go.”
